segments.text: How may I help you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to make some copies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The copier is right over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it cost to use it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We do charge to use the machine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We charge ten cents a copy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many copies am I allowed to make ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is no limit to how many copies you can make .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you mind showing me how to use it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please read the instructions on the copier .
segments.speaker: S1
